document.full_text: spain's miguel angel jimenez and australian brett rumford were in the driving seat at the ballantine's championship on saturday before rain and the threat of lighting brought an early end to the third round.
document.title: jimenez, rumford tied for lead at weather-hit ballantine's
lines_and_colors: spain's miguel angel jimenez and australian brett rumford were in the driving seat at the ballantine's championship on saturday before rain and the threat of lighting brought an early end to the third round.
